accesskeys.description: Ensure every accesskey attribute value is unique
accesskeys.help: accesskey attribute value should be unique

area-alt.description: Ensure <area> elements of image maps have alternative text
area-alt.help: Active <area> elements must have alternative text

aria-allowed-attr.description: Ensure an element's role supports its ARIA attributes
aria-allowed-attr.help: Elements must only use supported ARIA attributes

aria-allowed-role.description: Ensure role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
aria-allowed-role.help: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element

aria-braille-equivalent.description: Ensure aria-braillelabel and aria-brailleroledescription have a non-braille equivalent
aria-braille-equivalent.help: aria-braille attributes must have a non-braille equivalent

aria-command-name.description: Ensure every ARIA button, link and menuitem has an accessible name
aria-command-name.help: ARIA commands must have an accessible name

aria-conditional-attr.description: Ensure ARIA attributes are used as described in the specification of the element's role
aria-conditional-attr.help: ARIA attributes must be used as specified for the element's role

aria-deprecated-role.description: Ensure elements do not use deprecated roles
aria-deprecated-role.help: Deprecated ARIA roles must not be used

aria-dialog-name.description: Ensure every ARIA dialog and alertdialog node has an accessible name
aria-dialog-name.help: ARIA dialog and alertdialog nodes should have an accessible name

aria-hidden-body.description: Ensure aria-hidden="true" is not present on the document body.
aria-hidden-body.help: aria-hidden="true" must not be present on the document body

aria-hidden-focus.description: Ensure aria-hidden elements are not focusable nor contain focusable elements
aria-hidden-focus.help: ARIA hidden element must not be focusable or contain focusable elements

aria-input-field-name.description: Ensure every ARIA input field has an accessible name
aria-input-field-name.help: ARIA input fields must have an accessible name

aria-meter-name.description: Ensure every ARIA meter node has an accessible name
aria-meter-name.help: ARIA meter nodes must have an accessible name

aria-progressbar-name.description: Ensure every ARIA progressbar node has an accessible name
aria-progressbar-name.help: ARIA progressbar nodes must have an accessible name

aria-prohibited-attr.description: Ensure ARIA attributes are not prohibited for an element's role
aria-prohibited-attr.help: Elements must only use permitted ARIA attributes

aria-required-attr.description: Ensure elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes
aria-required-attr.help: Required ARIA attributes must be provided

aria-required-children.description: Ensure elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them
aria-required-children.help: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children

aria-required-parent.description: Ensure elements with an ARIA role that require parent roles are contained by them
aria-required-parent.help: Certain ARIA roles must be contained by particular parents

aria-roledescription.description: Ensure aria-roledescription is only used on elements with an implicit or explicit role
aria-roledescription.help: aria-roledescription must be on elements with a semantic role

aria-roles.description: Ensure all elements with a role attribute use a valid value
aria-roles.help: ARIA roles used must conform to valid values

aria-text.description: Ensure role="text" is used on elements with no focusable descendants

aria-toggle-field-name.description: Ensure every ARIA toggle field has an accessible name
aria-toggle-field-name.help: ARIA toggle fields must have an accessible name

aria-tooltip-name.description: Ensure every ARIA tooltip node has an accessible name
aria-tooltip-name.help: ARIA tooltip nodes must have an accessible name

aria-treeitem-name.description: Ensure every ARIA treeitem node has an accessible name
aria-treeitem-name.help: ARIA treeitem nodes should have an accessible name

aria-valid-attr.description: Ensure attributes that begin with aria- are valid ARIA attributes
aria-valid-attr.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid names

aria-valid-attr-value.description: Ensure all ARIA attributes have valid values
aria-valid-attr-value.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid values

audio-caption.help: <audio> elements must have a captions track

autocomplete-valid.description: Ensure the autocomplete attribute is correct and suitable for the form field
autocomplete-valid.help: autocomplete attribute must be used correctly

avoid-inline-spacing.description: Ensure that text spacing set through style attributes can be adjusted with custom stylesheets
avoid-inline-spacing.help: Inline text spacing must be adjustable with custom stylesheets

blink.help: <blink> elements are deprecated and must not be used

bypass.description: Ensure each page has at least one mechanism for a user to bypass navigation and jump straight to the content
bypass.help: Page must have means to bypass repeated blocks

color-contrast.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
color-contrast.help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

color-contrast-enhanced.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AAA enhanced contrast ratio thresholds
color-contrast-enhanced.help: Elements must meet enhanced color contrast ratio thresholds

css-orientation-lock.description: Ensure content is not locked to any specific display orientation, and the content is operable in all display orientations
css-orientation-lock.help: CSS Media queries must not lock display orientation

definition-list.help: <dl> elements must only directly contain properly-ordered <dt> and <dd> groups, <script>, <template> or <div> elements

dlitem.description: Ensure <dt> and <dd> elements are contained by a <dl>
dlitem.help: <dt> and <dd> elements must be contained by a <dl>

document-title.description: Ensure each HTML document contains a non-empty <title> element
document-title.help: Documents must have <title> element to aid in navigation

duplicate-id.description: Ensure every id attribute value is unique
duplicate-id.help: id attribute value must be unique

duplicate-id-active.description: Ensure every id attribute value of active elements is unique
duplicate-id-active.help: IDs of active elements must be unique

duplicate-id-aria.description: Ensure every id attribute value used in ARIA and in labels is unique
duplicate-id-aria.help: IDs used in ARIA and labels must be unique

empty-table-header.description: Ensure table headers have discernible text
empty-table-header.help: Table header text should not be empty

focus-order-semantics.description: Ensure elements in the focus order have a role appropriate for interactive content
focus-order-semantics.help: Elements in the focus order should have an appropriate role

form-field-multiple-labels.description: Ensure form field does not have multiple label elements
form-field-multiple-labels.help: Form field must not have multiple label elements

frame-focusable-content.description: Ensure <frame> and <iframe> elements with focusable content do not have tabindex=-1
frame-focusable-content.help: Frames with focusable content must not have tabindex=-1

frame-tested.description: Ensure <iframe> and <frame> elements contain the axe-core script
frame-tested.help: Frames should be tested with axe-core

frame-title.description: Ensure <iframe> and <frame> elements have an accessible name
frame-title.help: Frames must have an accessible name

frame-title-unique.description: Ensure <iframe> and <frame> elements contain a unique title attribute
frame-title-unique.help: Frames must have a unique title attribute

heading-order.description: Ensure the order of headings is semantically correct
heading-order.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

hidden-content.help: Hidden content on the page should be analyzed

html-has-lang.description: Ensure every HTML document has a lang attribute
html-has-lang.help: <html> element must have a lang attribute

html-lang-valid.description: Ensure the lang attribute of the <html> element has a valid value
html-lang-valid.help: <html> element must have a valid value for the lang attribute

html-xml-lang-mismatch.description: Ensure that HTML elements with both valid lang and xml:lang attributes agree on the base language of the page
html-xml-lang-mismatch.help: HTML elements with lang and xml:lang must have the same base language

identical-links-same-purpose.description: Ensure that links with the same accessible name serve a similar purpose
identical-links-same-purpose.help: Links with the same name must have a similar purpose

image-alt.description: Ensure elements have alternative text or a role of none or presentation

image-redundant-alt.description: Ensure image alternative is not repeated as text
image-redundant-alt.help: Alternative text of images should not be repeated as text

input-button-name.description: Ensure input buttons have discernible text
input-button-name.help: Input buttons must have discernible text

input-image-alt.description: Ensure <input type="image"> elements have alternative text
input-image-alt.help: Image buttons must have alternative text

label.description: Ensure every form element has a label

label-content-name-mismatch.description: Ensure that elements labelled through their content must have their visible text as part of their accessible name
label-content-name-mismatch.help: Elements must have their visible text as part of their accessible name

label-title-only.description: Ensure that every form element has a visible label and is not solely labeled using hidden labels, or the title or aria-describedby attributes
label-title-only.help: Form elements should have a visible label

landmark-banner-is-top-level.description: Ensure the banner landmark is at top level
landmark-banner-is-top-level.help: Banner landmark should not be contained in another landmark

landmark-complementary-is-top-level.description: Ensure the complementary landmark or aside is at top level
landmark-complementary-is-top-level.help: Aside should not be contained in another landmark

landmark-contentinfo-is-top-level.description: Ensure the contentinfo landmark is at top level
landmark-contentinfo-is-top-level.help: Contentinfo landmark should not be contained in another landmark

landmark-main-is-top-level.description: Ensure the main landmark is at top level
landmark-main-is-top-level.help: Main landmark should not be contained in another landmark

landmark-no-duplicate-banner.description: Ensure the document has at most one banner landmark
landmark-no-duplicate-banner.help: Document should not have more than one banner landmark

landmark-no-duplicate-contentinfo.description: Ensure the document has at most one contentinfo landmark
landmark-no-duplicate-contentinfo.help: Document should not have more than one contentinfo landmark

landmark-no-duplicate-main.description: Ensure the document has at most one main landmark
landmark-no-duplicate-main.help: Document should not have more than one main landmark

landmark-one-main.description: Ensure the document has a main landmark
landmark-one-main.help: Document should have one main landmark

landmark-unique.help: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

link-in-text-block.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color
link-in-text-block.help: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color

list.description: Ensure that lists are structured correctly
list.help: <ul> and <ol> must only directly contain <li>, <script> or <template> elements

listitem.help: <li> elements must be contained in a <ul> or <ol>

marquee.help: <marquee> elements are deprecated and must not be used

meta-refresh.description: Ensure <meta http-equiv="refresh"> is not used for delayed refresh
meta-refresh.help: Delayed refresh under 20 hours must not be used

meta-refresh-no-exceptions.description: Ensure <meta http-equiv="refresh"> is not used for delayed refresh
meta-refresh-no-exceptions.help: Delayed refresh must not be used

meta-viewport.description: Ensure <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming
meta-viewport.help: Zooming and scaling must not be disabled

meta-viewport-large.description: Ensure <meta name="viewport"> can scale a significant amount
meta-viewport-large.help: Users should be able to zoom and scale the text up to 500%

nested-interactive.description: Ensure interactive controls are not nested as they are not always announced by screen readers or can cause focus problems for assistive technologies
nested-interactive.help: Interactive controls must not be nested

no-autoplay-audio.description: Ensure <video> or <audio> elements do not autoplay audio for more than 3 seconds without a control mechanism to stop or mute the audio
no-autoplay-audio.help: <video> or <audio> elements must not play automatically

p-as-heading.description:
Ensure bold, italic text and font-size is not used to style

elements as a heading
p-as-heading.help:
Styled

elements must not be used as headings

page-has-heading-one.description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
page-has-heading-one.help: Page should contain a level-one heading

presentation-role-conflict.description: Ensure elements marked as presentational do not have global ARIA or tabindex so that all screen readers ignore them
presentation-role-conflict.help: Elements marked as presentational should be consistently ignored

region.description: Ensure all page content is contained by landmarks
region.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks

scope-attr-valid.description: Ensure the scope attribute is used correctly on tables
scope-attr-valid.help: scope attribute should be used correctly

scrollable-region-focusable.description: Ensure elements that have scrollable content are accessible by keyboard
scrollable-region-focusable.help: Scrollable region must have keyboard access

select-name.description: Ensure select element has an accessible name
select-name.help: Select element must have an accessible name

server-side-image-map.description: Ensure that server-side image maps are not used
server-side-image-map.help: Server-side image maps must not be used

skip-link.description: Ensure all skip links have a focusable target
skip-link.help: The skip-link target should exist and be focusable

summary-name.description: Ensure summary elements have discernible text
summary-name.help: Summary elements must have discernible text

svg-img-alt.description: Ensure <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have accessible text
svg-img-alt.help: <svg> elements with an img role must have alternative text

tabindex.description: Ensure tabindex attribute values are not greater than 0
tabindex.help: Elements should not have tabindex greater than zero

table-duplicate-name.description: Ensure the <caption> element does not contain the same text as the summary attribute
table-duplicate-name.help: Tables should not have the same summary and caption

table-fake-caption.description: Ensure that tables with a caption use the <caption> element.
table-fake-caption.help: Data or header cells must not be used to give caption to a data table.

target-size.description: Ensure touch targets have sufficient size and space
target-size.help: All touch targets must be 24px large, or leave sufficient space

td-has-header.description: Ensure that each non-empty data cell in a <table> larger than 3 by 3  has one or more table headers
td-has-header.help: Non-empty <td> elements in larger <table> must have an associated table header

td-headers-attr.description: Ensure that each cell in a table that uses the headers attribute refers only to other <th> elements in that table
td-headers-attr.help: Table cell headers attributes must refer to other <th> elements in the same table

th-has-data-cells.description: Ensure that <th> elements and elements with role=columnheader/rowheader have data cells they describe
th-has-data-cells.help: Table headers in a data table must refer to data cells

valid-lang.description: Ensure lang attributes have valid values
valid-lang.help: lang attribute must have a valid value
